name.value: Immunization - XIS Server - Test scenario 1.1 - Serve Immunization resources of XXX_Biezen - target CheckContent - XML Format

description.value: Scenario 1.1 - Serve Immunization resources of van XXX_Biezen
OAuth Token for current patient
X-Correlation-ID, by default a UUID following the MedMij Afsprakenstelsel. Does not have to be edited, see https://nictiz.atlassian.net/browse/MM-5132 for more information
Resource.id for Patient 1
Resource.id for Immunization 1
Resource.id for Immunization 2
Resource.id for Organization 1
Resource.id for Immunization 3
Resource.id for Organization 2
Resource.id for Immunization 4
Resource.id for Organization 3

This variable needs to be filled with the following params. The name (the variable name), sequenceNumber (the index), sourceId (the id of the resource) and as resource Immunization should be filled in

This variable needs to be filled with the following params. The name (the variable name), sequenceNumber (the index), sourceId (the id of the resource) and as resource Immunization should be filled in

This variable needs to be filled with the following params. The name (the variable name), sequenceNumber (the index), sourceId (the id of the resource) and as resource Immunization should be filled in

This variable needs to be filled with the following params. The name (the variable name), sequenceNumber (the index), sourceId (the id of the resource) and as resource Immunization should be filled in
Serve Immunization resource including the patient, performer and location
Test XIS server to serve Immunization resources.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.

name.value: Test scenario 1.1 - Serve vaccinations - Check Patient

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Patient that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: nl-core-Patient--XXX-Biezen)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Patient
Patient resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-Patient'
Contains .identifier with .system and .value

Contains .name with .use 'official', and .text with a value, and .family with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-name' with .valueString with a value. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails
Contains .name.use 'official'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .name.text with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert only checks existence of a value, because string comparisons can have many possible caveats

Contains .name.family with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-name' with .valueString with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails. This assert only checks existence of a value, because string comparisons can have many possible caveats
Contains .name.family with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .name.family.extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-name' with .valueString with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .telecom with .system 'phone' and with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-CodeSpecification' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-AddressUse' and .code 'MC' and .display, and .value with a value. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Patient).where(id = '${nl-core-Patient--XXX-Biezen-id}').telecom.where(system.where($this = 'phone' and extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-CodeSpecification').value.ofType(CodeableConcept).coding.where(system = 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-AddressUse' and code = 'MC' and display)) and value.hasValue()).exists()

description.value: Contains .telecom.system 'phone' and with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-CodeSpecification' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-AddressUse' and .code 'MC' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-4 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails
Contains .telecom.system 'phone'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-4-1 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .telecom.system.extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-CodeSpecification' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-AddressUse' and .code 'MC' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-4-1 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .telecom.value with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-4 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert only checks existence of a value, because string comparisons can have many possible caveats
Contains .birthDate

name.value: Test scenario 1.1 - Serve vaccinations - Check Immunization 1

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Immunization that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: 6a7b78de-6b07-11ec-0000-020000000000)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Immunization with properties: contains .vaccineCode.coding.code = '836398006'
Immunization resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/imm-Vaccination-event'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-imm-Vaccination.PharmaceuticalProduct' with .valueReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'completed'
Contains .vaccineCode with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '836398006' and .display
Contains .patient with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .occurrenceDateTime
Contains .location with either .reference or .identifier and .display

Contains .performer with .function with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and .code 'AP' and .display, and .actor with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).where(id = '${6a7b78de-6b07-11ec-0000-020000000000-id}').performer.where(function.coding.where(system = 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and code = 'AP' and display) and actor.where((reference or identifier) and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .performer.function with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and .code 'AP' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-10 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .performer.actor with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-10 checks if all children are present in the same parent

name.value: Test scenario 1.1 - Serve vaccinations - Check Immunization 2

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Immunization that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: 1d8ff616-6af9-11ec-0000-020000000000)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Immunization with properties: contains .vaccineCode.text = 'HEPATITIS-A-VACCIN'
Immunization resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/imm-Vaccination-event'
Contains .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/ext-imm-Vaccination.PharmaceuticalProduct' with .valueReference with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'completed'

Contains .vaccineCode with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-nullFlavor' with .valueCode 'OTH' and .text with a value. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

Contains .vaccineCode.extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-nullFlavor' with .valueCode 'OTH'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 2-6 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .vaccineCode with .text with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 2-6 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .patient with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .occurrenceDateTime
Contains .location with either .reference or .identifier and .display

Contains .performer with .function with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and .code 'AP' and .display, and .actor with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).where(id = '${1d8ff616-6af9-11ec-0000-020000000000-id}').performer.where(function.coding.where(system = 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and code = 'AP' and display) and actor.where((reference or identifier) and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .performer.function with .coding with .system 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0443' and .code 'AP' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 2-10 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .performer.actor with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 2-10 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .reasonCode with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '14747002' and .display

description.value: Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Organization that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: nl-core-HPrv-Org--Org-2165281100733-10000002)

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).where(id = '${2faed7c0-6b01-11ec-0000-020000000000-id}').vaccineCode.where(coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.10' and code = '206784' and display) and coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.7' and code = '2924528' and display) and coding.where(system = 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.4.1' and code = '184284' and display)).exists()

Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
